actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Education, Training and Employment.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Education, Training and Employment

official_title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to require recipients of Federal financial assistance to take affirmative action in the employment of qualified special disabled veterans and veterans of the Vietnam era.

summary.text: Requires recipients of Federal financial assistance to take affirmative action in the employment of qualified special disabled veterans and Vietnam era veterans.

titles.title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to require recipients of Federal financial assistance to take affirmative action in the employment of qualified special disabled veterans and veterans of the Vietnam era.
